name: jupi-zordon-3400
description: A bot to record League of Legends player statistics

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run exec
scripts.dev: npx nodemon -e js,ts,json,env -i ./node_modules -i ./build -i ./test -i ./docs -x npm run start --s
scripts.test: npx nodemon -e js,ts,json,env -i ./node_modules -i ./build -i ./docs -x npm run jasmine --s

author: Coopemalza S.A.
